TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you now have the experience of Danny2462... when he first got the game.

I wish I had bluetooth headphones

Granted... Here you go!

I wish I could go back in time

Granted. You go back to this morning. Every evening. Groundhog Day style.

I wish it was 1995 again.

Granted. Suddenly, all the clocks on the planet are set to January 1st, 1995 ('cus theoretically you can't travel back in time).

I wish for an A (grade) in my classes.

Granted. Giant pieces(leaves?) of paper that were graded incorrectly and by me begin eating everyone.

I wish that the pear trees I have would turn into plum trees.

Granted. you are allergic to plums.

I wish I could fly.

Granted. You're now a mosquito and promptly get swatted.

I wish I could visit the National Museum of the USAF in Dayton.

Granted. Unfortunately, you encounter me there... (I've been there like seven times)

I wish that my tractor would stop breaking.

Edited August 18, 2014 by Vaporo

Granted. Your car now keeps breaking down.

I wish I was a potato.

Granted. The Chell you're with is an idiot and falls into a lava pit or something.

I wish for a lava pit.

Granted. The pit forms in your home.

I wish for more Kevin MacLeod music.

Granted. Everyone hates it for being used in minecraft machinima.

I wish for KSP [noun].

Granted. It's KSP [adjective] and you accidentally KSP [verb] it.

I wish to know which mod Squad is incorporating.

Granted. None.

??????

Granted...

I wish for people to actually wish for stuff in this game.

Granted. Everyone only wishes for ponies.

I wish for a pony.

Granted.

However,

I wish for a pony to give to master Tao.

Granted. The pony is Hired Gun. Good luck.

I wish for a way to remember where I put my Command and Conquer games.

Granted, you can now listen to the letter A tell you where you put them. The letter A actually magically causes all the C&C games to be beyond your sight (behind you).

I wish to be green.

Granted, you are a kerbal on a colonization mission to Eve.

I wish i were Gene Kerman.

Granted. You just called yourself Gene, the guy who isn't the MC.

I wish I was Jeb... nah, $%!#^ that, I wish I was Bill... nah, #!%$^ that, I wish I was...

Granted, now you are green and love explosions and have a high stupidity level.

I wish I had a fully-functional upgradeable bionic limb that didn't hook me up to anything.

Enjoy your bionic hair folicle:)!

I wish that this isn't granted.

Granted.

I wish to know why people obess over Frozen. Yep i dont like it.

Granted. Frozen's fanbase is a mind virus that started with just a few people. Once they amass enough followers, they will turn into horrible zombies.

I wish for a mind virus that isn't frozen.
